name: Blood and Dice
description:
Dora Culle is a new vampire who wants to join the most famous vampire gang in town, The Fang's. He must survive the dungeon all night and prove his worth to become a great vampire gang member. Use the blood around you to help Dora survive the night!

Blood and Dice is a casual time survival game, with RNG-based gameplay.
You play as Dora Culle, collect vials of blood, let the dice roll to activate your skills, and survive the dungeon until morning comes.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left-click - Choose on the menu and to continue the dialogue
  • Esc - Hold to fast forward/skip the dialogue

Use of Limitation:
Dora can only use his skills to kill the enemies around him if he has blood, hence blood is lethal to the enemies and himself.

This game is developed to join Mini Jam 118: Vampires
